biotools.summary: KluDo (Diffusion Kernel-based Graph Node Clustering for Protein Domain Assignment), is an automatic framework that incorporates diffusion kernels on protein graphs as affinity measures between residues to decompose protein structures into structural domains.

bioschemas.name: kludo
bioschemas.summary: KluDo (Diffusion Kernel-based Graph Node Clustering for Protein Domain Assignment), is an automatic framework that incorporates diffusion kernels on protein graphs as affinity measures between residues to decompose protein structures into structural domains.
